text: Samira Imani Fouladi is a former Iranian volleyball player and current coach. She is one of the most decorated female volleyball players in Iran and the first Iranian woman to coach a European volleyball club.https://www.qudsonline.ir/news/774888https://www.eghtesadnews.com/بخش- اخبار-سایر-رسانه-ها-61/451037 == Coaching career == * Head coach of Porto Volleyball Club, Portugal, champion of Portuguese Premier League 2022.https://www.irna.ir/amp/84522768/https://www.entekhab.ir/fa/amp/news/645085https://www.varzesh3.com/news/1788727 * Head coach of Saipa Volleyball Club, champion of Iranian Premier League 2024.https://www.mehrnews.com/news/6455394 * Coach of Iran senior national team at the 2017 Middle Asia Championship in Maldives, achieving first place.https://www.etemadonline.com/tags/سمیرا_ایمانی_فولادی * Player-coach of Giti Pasand club, champion of 2011 Iranian Volleyball League. * Head coach of Isfahan province youth team, champion from 2017 to 2022.https://www.irna.ir/amp/85713235/ == Playing career == * Seven championship titles in the Iranian Premier Volleyball League. * Best league player in 2005, 2006, and 2007.https://www.bbc.com/persian/sport-59851417.amp * Member of the Iranian women's national volleyball team from 2002 to 2018. * Runner-up at the 2004 Islamic Countries Championship in Doha, Qatar. == Management career == * Director of women's sports at Foolad Mahan Sepahan Club (2011). * Technical director of Saipa senior team and volleyball academy (2024). * Recognized as a top female athlete in Iran in 2008. == Education == * Honorary doctorate from the World Elite Association (2021). * Master's degree in Physical Education and Sport Sciences (2014). == Coaching certifications == * International Level 2 coaching certificate (2018).https://www.isna.ir/news/1400100603453 == References == * https://www.qudsonline.ir/news/774888 * https://www.eghtesadnews.com/بخش-
